announcements.title: NEW ITEM: Morphing Bracelet Added!
announcements.message:
We've added the new Morphing Bracelet! Check out the Custom Items tab for pictures and crafting details.

*Key features:*
1. Kill any mob with the bracelet in your inventory to **collect its morph**.
2. **Crafting:** 4 Soul Soil + 1 Soul Glass Block (smelt Soul Sand).
3. **Repair:** Hold the bracelet and stand on Soul Sand/Soil to repair its durability.

announcements.title: Server Update
announcements.message:
A major update is coming tomorrow! The new update includes:
1️⃣🗑 Trash Can Block – toss away unwanted items instantly.
2️⃣⚙️ Item Filter System – keep your inventory clean and organized.
3️⃣🌌 Infinite Night Vision – see the world in eternal clarity, day or night!
4️⃣🌀 Teleportation Magic – travel across the server faster than ever before.
5️⃣💠 New Magical Items – discover enchanted tools with unique powers.
6️⃣🎨 Fresh Models & Textures – magical blocks and items with brand-new looks.
